content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a browse_website command to find information about the Brno Reservoir Trail on AllTrails, but the command returned an error. Then, I received a google command to search for "Brno Reservoir Trail information" and it returned several links, including AllTrails, Great Runs, Hiking is Good, and Outdoor Active.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/", "question": "What information can I find about the Brno Reservoir Trail on the Outdooractive website?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information about the Brno Reservoir Trail in the Czech Republic, including its distance, duration, elevation, and track types. The trail is described as a hike around the lake with several bus stops towards the end, making it easy to shorten the route. The text also includes information on how to get to the trail, nearby routes, and reviews from other hikers. The Outdooractive website offers additional services and information, including registration, pro options, and leisure tips for the region.\n\nLinks: ['Skip to content (https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/#mainContent)', 'Map (https://www.outdooractive.com/en/map/)', 'Route Finder (https://www.outdooractive.com/en/routes/)', 'Route Planner (https://www.outdooractive.com/en/routeplanner/)', 'Travel Guide (https://www.outdooractive.com/en/travel-guide/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
